meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cindy Peterson Cory Biggs Christopher Short Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6122.

td.p: Cindy Peterson, a crossing guard from Geneva, Illinois
Cory Biggs, a graduate student of public service from Little Rock, Arkansas
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $32,000)

tr.td: ON BENDED KNEE
WHO SANG IT?
IN FLORIDA
(Alex: Each correct response will be made up from letters in the word "Florida".)
OPRAH'S SURPRISES
LEGAL ABBREV.
A STACK OF KNOWLEDGE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 2010 he gave his late mother\'s engagement ring to Kate Middleton in Kenya')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 2010 he gave his late mother's engagement ring to Kate Middleton in Kenya
